channel.title: Economic Development on Planning with Data

item.title: Measuring NC job loss from Covid-19
item.description: Over the past four weeks, more than 20 million people have filed for unenmployment as the country adjusts to the economic fallout of Covid-19. While we still donâ€™t know the longterm impacts of the pandemic, widespread job loss creates an immediate need for Americans without savings to cover their cost of living. What do we know about the people and places that have been most impacted by the recent shock in unemployment?
